item.title: CMC: The Initial Circulating Supply of WLFI is 272.1 Billion tokens as confirmed by the project team
item.description: On September 1st, CoinMarketCap CEO Rush declared that the circulating supply data of WLFI has been repeatedly verified with the project team, and Binance and other exchanges also utilize this data. CoinMarketCap shows that the initial circulating supply of WLFI is 27.21 billion tokens, which is significantly higher than the estimated 5 billion tokens.

item.title: Binance: The FOREST TGE participation threshold is 240 Alpha Points
item.description: On September 1st, as per an official announcement, Binance declared that Binance users possessing 240 points or more of Binance Alpha Point are eligible to participate in the FOREST (FOREST) TGE event via the Alpha event page. Participating in this event will result in a deduction of 15 points.

item.title: Bitcoin Bounces Back Above $108,000
item.description: On September 1st, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin rebounded to a level above $108,000 and is currently priced at $108,010, with a 0.74% decrease in the past 24 hours.

item.title: Satsuma Technology increased its holdings to 22.65 BTC, with total holdings reaching 1148.65 BTC
item.description: On September 1st, according to @btcNLNico, by August 8th, the London-based artificial intelligence company Satsuma Technology had increased its holdings by 22.65 bitcoins, and the total position reached 1148.65 bitcoins.

item.title: Binance Wallet (Web Version) Launches Referral Program
item.description: September 1st. As per an official announcement, Binance has declared that the Binance Wallet (Web Version) Referral Program has officially been launched. Beginning at 2:00 PM on September 1, 2025 (UTC+8), users are able to invite friends to trade on the Binance platform and obtain a referral reward of up to 80%. Meanwhile, the invited friends can also avail themselves of a 10% rebate on trading fees.To participate in the referral program, users need to log in to the Binance Wallet (Web Version) using their Binance accounts. Eligible users can generate a unique referral code, invite friends, and receive rewards based on their friends' trading activities.

item.title: Historical Data: Ethereum averaged a -5.75% return in September, while Bitcoin averaged a -3.55% return in September
item.description: On September 1st, according to Coinglass data, since 2016, Ethereum has had an average September return of -5.75%. In the past 9 years, only 4 of them have had a positive September return, which were in 2016, 2019, 2023, and 2024 respectively.Moreover, since 2013, Bitcoin has had an average September return of -3.55%. Among the past 12 years, only 4 have had a positive September return, which were in 2015, 2016, 2023, and 2024 respectively.

item.title: Viewpoint: Inflation Data Intensifies Market Bearish Sentiment, Bitcoin's Key Psychological Support Level at $100,000
item.description: On September 1st, Vincent Liu, the CIO of Kronos Research, stated that the inflation data has intensified the bearish market sentiment. This sentiment initially emerged after a series of large-scale Bitcoin whale sell-offs triggered the liquidation of leveraged positions.Vincent Liu believes: "The key psychological support level of Bitcoin is at $100,000. With leveraged positions under pressure, it highlights the fragility of its liquidity." He also added that the key support level of Ethereum is at $4,000. "If these support levels are breached, it could trigger further declines and more widespread liquidity tightening. However, a true bear market requires a more sustained decline."Regarding this week's non-farm payroll data, Vincent Liu stated, "A significant surprise in job growth could trigger sharp market volatility. Strong data could pressure the cryptocurrency as risk appetite wanes, while weaker-than-expected data could boost demand." (The Block)

item.title: Four.Meme has announced a CDL presale update, and refunds will be processed early today at 4:00 PM.
item.description: September 1st, according to official channels, Four.Meme has rolled out an update regarding the Creditlink (CDL) presale. The refund will be processed earlier today at 4:00 PM. Due to a significant transaction volume, the team expects the refund process to be completed within 3 to 4 hours. The funds will be automatically returned to the original address.Previously, Four.Meme was planned to carry out an oversubscribed refund at 6:00 PM today.

item.title: Metaplanet's Shareholder Meeting Today to Vote on $8.84 Billion Stock Sale Plan
item.description: On September 1st, according to Techinasia, at 9:00 a.m. on September 1st (assuming this is the specific time in the local context), the publicly listed Japanese company Metaplanet will convene a shareholders' meeting in Tokyo. During this meeting, a vote will be conducted on a plan to sell up to 550 million new shares overseas, with the aim of raising approximately $884 million. The company intends to utilize the majority of the funds to purchase a greater amount of Bitcoin.Eric Trump, the son of former U.S. President Donald Trump and an advisor to Metaplanet since March, is anticipated to attend this event.

item.title: Australia's Monochrome Spot Bitcoin ETF's BTC Holdings Rise to 1021 Coins
item.description: On September 1st, according to an official announcement, the Australian Monochrome Physical Bitcoin ETF (IBTC) disclosed that as of August 29th, its holdings had reached 1,021 bitcoins, with a holding value of approximately 172 million Australian dollars.
